summary: Test suite that verifies the proper integration of user-defined security policies into the scanning engine, checking policy loading, execution during different scan phases, handling of cloned checks, suppression behavior, and operation across multiple IaC frameworks.
business_intent: Provide confidence that custom security policies can be seamlessly incorporated into the platform, ensuring they are correctly parsed, applied, and respected during scans of various infrastructure-as-code templates, thereby supporting compliance and risk-management objectives.
